roleset.name: stick to, overly obsessive lover

example.name: this should suffice
example.text: His point: It will be increasingly difficult for the U.S. to cling to command-and-control measures if even the East Bloc steps to a different drummer.
example.arg: if even the East Bloc steps to a different drummer.

example.name: Gimme some space!
example.text: You could always say something like " Hi , thank you very much for your message but I have met somebody in the last couple of weeks and feel this might be the one ! " - it would be letting people down gently but you 'd scare off a lot of those guys because they 'd think you were clingy !

example.name: I'm stickin with you, cause I'm made out of glue!
example.text: We're always fighting because I always get so emotional and clingy with him and he hates it which is completely understandable.

roleset.note: CLING-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cling' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 22.5 and 43.2. (from cling.01-v predicate notes)
CLINGY-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Verbnet entry 22.5. (from clingy.01-j)

roleset.name: make a sound like a small bell

example.name: ARG1
example.text: The lift bell “clinged” and the door opened with a whisper.

roleset.note: CLING-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cling' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 22.5 and 43.2. (from cling.02-v predicate notes)
